Business decision maker.question: What are your primary goals for implementing AI?

options.answer: Enhance search, productivity and streamline workflows within Microsoft 365 apps
Create customized AI agents for specific business processes
Build advanced, scalable AI applications with extensive customization

options.answer: Internal employees only
External users only
Both Internal and External users

Business decision maker.question: What level of customization do you expect?

options.answer: Basic - I only need basic AI features that can be easily integrated by copying and pasting
Moderate - integrate AI features with existing platforms like Microsoft Teams or a web application
Extensive - build highly customized AI solutions that can integrate with multiple data sources and require significant development effort

options.answer: Fast implementation - Purchase AI services and consume them right away
Moderate timeline - Purchase AI, and quick integration and customization
Longer timeline due to complexity of workload, many AIs are required

No

No - AI is for just indivisual assistant or my end users
